query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST0203 ( MANDT, PSPID, POSID, CHK_KIND, CHASU, KETF1_DATE, KETF2_DATE, KETF3_DATE, RECEPTIONIST, BIGO, MDATE, MTIME, ERNAM )
VALUES
( #G_MANDT#, #PSPID#, #POSID#, #CHK_KIND#, #CHASU#, DECODE(VALUE(#KETF1_DATE#,HEX(CURRENT DATE)),'00000000',HEX(CURRENT DATE),#KETF1_DATE#), #KETF2_DATE#, #KETF3_DATE#, 'È­¹°Çü', CAST(#BIGO# AS VARCHAR(600) ), SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8), SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6), #G_USER_NAME# )
